name: Retractable Dog Leash
imageAlt: Retractable dog leash with ergonomic handle, lock button, and 5-metre cord
shortDescription: Give your dog freedom to explore with a smooth, tangle-free retractable leash.
description: Let your dog sniff, wander, and explore without losing control. This 5-metre retractable leash gives your pup room to roam while keeping them safely tethered to you. The one-button lock lets you set the distance instantly, and the ergonomic handle is comfortable enough for those long evening walks around the neighbourhood.
features: 5-metre retractable nylon tape extends and retracts smoothly
One-button lock and release for instant distance control
Ergonomic non-slip handle with comfortable grip padding
Built-in LED torch for safe night walks
Supports dogs up to 25kg with reinforced tape construction
